title: open gothic 50 year old wedding invitation
content:
50 year old wedding invitation that I need to recreate as a 50th anniversary invitation. Most local printers in Orlando, FL are out of business. Thanks in advance for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [invitationfont.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213518/http:/typophile.com/files/invitationfont_0.png) | 409.91 KB |
author: info@myfriendja...

comments.content: **[Posh Soiree NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213518/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Nick-Curtis&ffam=Posh%20Soiree%20NF%20-%20Regular&fid=ff8c6f4781c7232ba7fdfa6b3d568d4f&fsize=60&text=in%20the%20Sacremant%20of%20Holy%20Matrimony&wrap=2)** by Nick Curtis looks like an exact match

Concur, Nick's Posh Soiree is a good digital interpretation of Morris Fuller Benton's Engravers Text, the metal font used to print the invitation.  
Don
